meanings.definition: The act of taking part in something.
meanings.sent1: Her participations in the school play brought her joy.
meanings.sent2: Family participations in the picnic made it more enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: His participations in the dance-off were quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Their participations in the project were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The participations of the audience made the event lively.

meanings.definition: The act of sharing in something.
meanings.sent1: Their participations in the potluck dinner were delicious.
meanings.sent2: Community participations in the charity event were heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The participations in the cookie jar caused some giggles.
meanings.sent4: Her participations in the conversation were like adding spices to a dish.
meanings.sent5: The participations of the team led to a successful outcome.

meanings.definition: The act of being involved in something.
meanings.sent1: His participations in the meeting were valuable.
meanings.sent2: School participations in the science fair were impressive.
meanings.sent3: The participations in the treasure hunt were full of surprises.
meanings.sent4: Their participations in the discussion were like pieces of a puzzle coming together.
meanings.sent5: The participations of the volunteers made the event run smoothly.
